attributes.review: Not sure what jokes the president is playing on the American populace but I wanted to see what this was about, not get assaulted by a stale Cheeto ad. If I wanted to get my hands dirty I’d stick my hands in trail mix and they’d still be cleaner than me swiping my thumb across my screen with the app open.
attributes.title: Opened it and all I saw was a Cheeto ad

attributes.review: So I opened this app right? And all of the sudden this Cheeto names Donald popped up on my screen and I was like 👀 because I’m allergic cheese.  Because of his lack of competence and disregard for my digestive tract I suffered a massive allergic reaction that caused severely unpleasant bowel movements and left me near death... the same state I was in while using this app... VERY DISPLEASED!!!!!! 💩💩💩💩
attributes.title: Allergic reaction

attributes.review: I cannot believe this app!! I am a proud American and I was so excited to share my thoughts with likeminded individuals free of snowflakes and censorship but it's just impossible! Not only is the layout confusing but it is asking ME for my private information!!! DO NOT GIVE THIS APP YOUR INFORMATION. This app is intrusive and WILL NOT STOP SENDING ME NOTIFICATIONS.
attributes.title: THIS APP WILL STEAL YOUR INFORMATION

attributes.review: After donating through this app! My Credit Card Information was stolen and used to Commit Fraud!!! My Credit Card Company told me it was BECAUSE of This App! This needs to be TAKEN DOWN Immediately! This is Reflected Very Poorly on Our President! It Also made My Wife File for Divorced!
attributes.title: STOLE My Credit Card Informations!!!!

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app, I found out why you needed to put your phone number... 20 minutes later, I got a text saying “vote trump,” and when I looked outside, I saw this weird Cheeto thingy looking at me. I quickly deleted this app, only to see Trump dipping his wig in Cheeto dust.
attributes.title: Horrifying

attributes.review: All I wanted is to get up to date information on the best president ever in offices 2020 campaign!! And I can’t even open the app!!!!! This app should be taken down for maintenance asap if possible I would rate 0/5 stars because I couldn’t even use it >:(((
attributes.title: Keeps crashing!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was high and really craving some Cheetos and when I opened the app I saw the most racist, conceded, small-minded, idiotic Cheeto I have ever seen. Obviously I looked him up on twitter and it turns out he is far from packing down there... Anyways I attend therapy twice a week in order to cope with this.
attributes.title: IM SCARED

attributes.review: All these other reviews are ridiculous and obviously fake, so I downloaded it. It actually DID delete my important emails and saved files. Including my college application that was about to be sent out! DO NOT download this app. It is a nightmare.
attributes.title: WATCH OUT

attributes.review: I’ve sent the app to a few friends and only have 100 points to show for it.   That’s not right.  Also I should be credited for the money I’ve donated so far this year.  It’s the right thing to do.
attributes.title: Points

attributes.review: How would i describe this app you may ask? atrocious. in one word. to keep it simple. the app gave me the same viruses as pornhub so i’m just letting you know if you want to have the literal definition of garbage on your cellular device by all means. also it gave me chlamydia
attributes.title: Very trash.
